short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helper Tools for Etsy sellers: Easily Copy Tags from Esty listing and Export Reviews

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
CraftSpy is a helper tool for Etsy sellers.

We plan to become the #1 helper tool for Etsy sellers, starting from scratch.

Features:
- Display tags in Etsy listings with a one-click copy option.
- Export product reviews to CSV or Excel, whether for a single product or an entire shop.

How to use: Find in-place controls, such as buttons and drop-downs, that allow you to use the features above.

Please note, this extension is freemium software, offering functionality for free with certain limits. To access unlimited features, upgrade to the premium plan.

List of supported fields of a review:
- Review ID: Unique identifier of the review, also known as Data Transation ID
- Review Text
- Date Published
- Rating
- Subrating Item Quality
- Subrating Shipping
- Subrating Customer Service
- Author Name
- Author ID
- Product ID
- Product URL
- Shop ID
- Image: image URL

Disclaimer: Etsy is a registered trademark of Etsy, Inc. This tool is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or associated with Etsy, Inc.
